name: Pax Extraterrestria
description:
Pax Extraterrestria

Overview:

You are a Roman warrior, just escaped from a zoo run by a race of future aliens. Can you hack 'n slash your way back to your place in time?

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys or WASD
Attack: Left Click or 'C'
Block: Right Click or 'X' (useful for deflecting laser blasts)

Created by Classy Hat Studios for Ludum Dare #36
